entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning and early in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 24 April 2023
